website_summaries.verdict: Easy for two people to assemble, this zip line has LED lights and a seat. A great choice for neighborhood parties, with a three-season rating.
pros: Riders have a choice between handlebars and a seat with LED lights
Length makes for more setup and distance options
Zip line's 100 feet of galvanized steel cable can be adjusted to fit the site

customer_reviews.title: lights look awesome at night
customer_reviews.text: We are the hit of the neighborhood. Took my husband and me about an hour to get it put up, lights look awesome at night, will be fun in the summer, but all the kids had fun playing on it in the snow too! We didn't buy any of the extra stuff, used a pool noodle as a bumper and wooden blocks with a channel routed in the middle under the strap around the trees.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsachi

customer_reviews.title: This zip line has potential to bring hours of fun to our entire family
customer_reviews.text: This zip line has potential to bring hours of fun to our entire family. Unfortunately we ordered this as a Christmas gift for our boys. With much anticipation and excitement we began to install it Christmas morning. Unfortunately the fun came to a stop when it was missing parts, most notabley the LED lighted seat. After calling Amazon we had another sent but took 5 days to arrive. After 5 days of waiting for the Christmas gift to arrive we were again very excited to get this zip line up and in use. Shockingly this set again had missing parts, including the seat. This was so dissappointing and a huge let down!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Super awesome, outdoor fun gliding through our wooded backyard
customer_reviews.text: This has been a hit with nearly everyone who has visited our home. We set it up in our wooded backyard and it has provided hours and hours of fun. It can be tricky to set up, as you have to find the right location to get the "rise over run" calculations right. Our first couple locations were too steep and we had to adjust until we found just the right height and location on our property. Note: the lights are truly gimmicky and stopped working after about a month, but that's not why we bought this thing
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Wayne

customer_reviews.title: All the lights are garbage.  Go with kit that does not contain lights. SAVE THE MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it, all the single lights that go on the rope all broke the first hour, they suck, I had to tape them on. The light on top of trolley also has problems. Button seems stuck.
customer_reviews.author: happy wife

customer_reviews.title: My kids LOVE this zipline
customer_reviews.text: My kids LOVE this zipline. I give it only 4 stars because the small lights on the rope near the t-bar are a joke; cheaply made and attached with zip ties- they've all busted and fallen off. The lighted seat, however, is super cool. It's a little confusing because the only "on-off" switch for the LED lights on the seat is designated with a "try me" stamp, yet it's the only switch. I wish the lights had a timer, as my kids forget and leave it on for days. Even so, the battery life seems to hold up. I would recommend this zipline.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Makes all kids happy
customer_reviews.text: Omg what a funit it is! Ours came without seat as it is previously mentioned in other reviews. My daughter was very disappointed when we opened the box :( amazon sent new one right away but bday was ruined :( AnywaSy our kids friends just live coming to our yard! This one is fun & hours of playing!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: my granddaughters liked the zip line at a camp they had went ...
customer_reviews.text: I sent this to my children in Australia.....my granddaughters liked the zip line at a camp they had went to....I thought I read on the review that it held 250 lobs but on the box it said 200 lbs...Never the less none of the adults weigh more that 200 so it's good ...and you should test it with a 300lb weight ...They are still trying to figure out which tree to attack it to but I am sure they will enjoy....will write more when it is up....
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Putting it up wasn't too bad though we did have to play with it some ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was dying to get a zipline in the backyard and we finally got one. Putting it up wasn't too bad though we did have to play with it some since our backyard has a slope already. At first it was REALLY fast, but we fixed it and it's less dangerous now, ha ha. We did add a "private protector" as we call it (aka noodle) around the rope part where they put their legs around. Slamming at the bottom isn't too comfortable. It's a great product for the price and I'd recommend it, they love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it - be cautious when you have your kids ...
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it - be cautious when you have your kids dismount. Two of my kids gave themselves black eyes from the seat (not the actual ride). If they jump off the tension gives and the seat will spring up. Only took once for them to learn that lesson! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Kirsti M. Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: The kids love this thing. I basically followed the youtube videos for installation as well as the provided instructions. I put it together by myself, so having a winch was mandatory to get the line tight. I have had it for over a month now and have had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: DWB

customer_reviews.title: Would buy this again
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our grandkids to use in our backyard. They love it. I did switch out the the riding apparatus for a child swing seat and it is far better, secure, and inviting for them.
customer_reviews.author: Leroyfuff

customer_reviews.title: Challenging install!
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty handy, but took some time to setup. Had to install a 20 ft. pole because I have no trees. Had to use a come-a-long to hold cable taight while getting the turnbuckle connected. Still worth the money, and kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Darrel Lieder

customer_reviews.title: Don’t even hesitate. Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Way better than expected I am not very good installing stuff and this was very simple. My kids absolutely love it they won’t get off of it.
customer_reviews.author: RobeGarza

customer_reviews.title: Missing seat
customer_reviews.text: From the pictures, it appears the seat is in a second box that wasn't sent. Looked through the reviews and I'm not the only one who didn't get the lighted seat.
customer_reviews.author: UtahDad

customer_reviews.title: this was the best purchase I have made in many years We put ...
customer_reviews.text: this was the best purchase I have made in many years We put it up on friday at our cabin, and the grandkids played all weekend on it, Even into the night (cause of the light) I recommend it to anyone who needs a babysitter. lol Right now I'm the best grandma ever! lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It looks like the seat should have been included but I didn't ...
customer_reviews.text: The product I received didn't have a LED seat. This was the big part of the product I was looking for because it gave an extra level of support for a young child. It looks like the seat should have been included but I didn't get one.
customer_reviews.author: John M

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved it
customer_reviews.text: Man this is an awesome thing if you have the right spot for it! Kids loved it. Better have 2 good trees though.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Mielitz

customer_reviews.title: good enough
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install- the whole light up deal is over rated. it's doesn't stay on and the batteries had to be taped in and it still fell out. The top light broke off right away- plastic!
customer_reviews.author: Christy Hurley

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to set up. we were able to get it going in less that an hour. My 4 year old is in love with it we are on it everyday! He thinks the lights are the best thing since slice bread!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Morris

customer_reviews.title: a great way to keep the kids playing outside
customer_reviews.text: This was a hit, a great way to keep the kids playing outside. It was simple to put up and, although one of the lights didn't work, I was able to call the number and they told me they would send out the replacement trolley light. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: This zip line did not work, we tried to put it up several different ways and the carriage would only go a few feet and stop, it was very difficult to tighten, I would not recommend it! Is there any way I can return it for a credit?
customer_reviews.author: rebecca sander

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 8 and 14 year old daughters. They love it! All the kids in the neighborhood come by to try it. I myself also enjoy the test rides. Easy to install. It took me around thirty minutes to install a 100 ft zip line.
customer_reviews.author: Alvin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent zipline
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I've had it up for around 3 years now and it works like a charm. I've had adults weighing up to 200 lbs use it without a problem.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Not as easy to install as they say
customer_reviews.text: Harder to install then their video says. It took hours and a lot of man power to stretch this cable. After it was up it worked great. But be prepared to work at getting it up
customer_reviews.author: Ken Heinemann

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: ordered 100' night kit, got an 85' blue seated unit - total false advertising.
customer_reviews.author: nmorris

customer_reviews.title: Missing main part of zipline.
customer_reviews.text: Opened Xmas morning to find that it is missing the seat and other parts. Way to spoil the day...
customer_reviews.author: A. Eagle

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it and its easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it and its easy to set up, I got the brake kit with it since the kids like to go fast, definitely measure out the space between the trees. awesome fun that all the kids enjoy from my 6yr old to my 68 yr old mother inlaw
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality
customer_reviews.text: SOOOOO fun! Great quality, decent price. This is a good one!
customer_reviews.author: Scarlet Scholar

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY! NO SEAT INCLUDED - FALSE ADVERTISING!!
customer_reviews.text: Package and instructions (and box and insert) indicate that this comes with a lighted seat. NO SEAT in my package. VERY disappointed kids here. Very grumpy mama. Would give a zero if I could.
customer_reviews.author: dalescapades+woocru

customer_reviews.title: Awesome is all i can say
customer_reviews.text: Awesome is all i can say! It was for my 6yr old & granted she loves it but i think her dad and i love it more!! Definitely fun and something different to do in the backyard!
customer_reviews.author: Ktbug1

customer_reviews.title: Received as a Christmas gift and only received seat. ...
customer_reviews.text: Received as a Christmas gift and only received seat. Missing all other parts. Didn't realize this until several months later when we went to put it up. Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing Seat
customer_reviews.text: Kit arrived without the seat, which seems to be a problem that numerous other buyers have had. Was told the seat could not be shipped out separately so now I have to ship the entire kit back and hope the next kit comes with the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Haydinger

customer_reviews.title: Super cool, and fun at night with the LED ...
customer_reviews.text: A hit with the kids. Super cool, and fun at night with the LED lights.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Brown

customer_reviews.title: Missing most important piece!
customer_reviews.text: My zipline arrived without the seat in the box and we have no ability to contact the seller. stuck and out $200!
customer_reviews.author: Susan H.

customer_reviews.title: I thought it would get old like most things they want do
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 8 year old son and he loves it. Him and my nieces play on it all the time. I thought it would get old like most things they want do, but they still get on it all the time. Even the adults have enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Lynn Dees

customer_reviews.title: Was surprisingly easy to install as well
customer_reviews.text: Kids are having blast with this one. The fact you get 100 feet of cable allows for a lot of options distance-wise. Was surprisingly easy to install as well.
customer_reviews.author: FAlex

customer_reviews.title: Fun fun fun
customer_reviews.text: Awesome toy. Loads of fun. Very easy set up. You will need to tighten the cable after a few weeks of use. Not a big deal as it's easy to do.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Gavin

customer_reviews.title: Tons of fun
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing! My 11 year old and 8 year old love this. Very easy to assemble. Only negative thing I can say is wish it had a brake
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Never too cold?
customer_reviews.text: In the middle of winter the kids played on this for hours.
customer_reviews.author: ACDelyea

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Exactly what we were looking for
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Exactly what we were looking for. We built a platform to launch from and kept it fairly close to the ground so the little kids could ride it but tight enough for my 265 lb husband to ride it. We put blocks of wood between the tree and the cable to protect the bark on the tree. We love it and the kids have had a blast!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Moore

customer_reviews.title: He is over the moon happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Bought for grandson for Christmas. He is over the moon happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Just G

customer_reviews.title: Did not receive cable and trolley
customer_reviews.text: I only received the plastic seat and rope. No trolley or 100 feet of cable. For $180 I was supposed to receive all 3.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Schaefer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: a pain to install but kids love it - sturdy and safe. nice lights! long rope!
customer_reviews.author: princess buttercup

customer_reviews.title: Buy this today!
customer_reviews.text: My kids absolutely love this zip line. It includes everything you need to start having fun right away! Buy it. You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great seller and product
customer_reviews.text: Super fast shipping. Very happy with the product. Seems of high quality and can't wait to get it installed.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Safe with supervision and so much fun we have two.
customer_reviews.author: dana beach

customer_reviews.title: Hang ten!
customer_reviews.text: The kids love it, works great and is so much fun!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy L. Massey

customer_reviews.title: Great fun, not so easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this thing. I'll be honest and say it works way better than expected. I followed the installation directions to a T, including exact start and end heights. I installed this alone (34 y/o male), but I think even if you had 3 strong people, you couldn't get the tension the line needs at the manufacturer recommended heights which is why I'm giving it 4 starts. I ended up buying a come along and hand it up inside an hour. And now I have a come along too! The lights push it over the top and kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend it to any family
customer_reviews.text: Every kid who comes over wants to go on the zipline! We have had many smiles and laughs....adults AND kids, while riding it! Totally worth the purchase price!! I would recommend it to any family!!
customer_reviews.author: Michele Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My whole family has used this and we love it! I would not go under 100' though.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl C, Henry

customer_reviews.title: We've had this for 6 months and it's great. Adults and kids have a blast and rather ...
customer_reviews.text: We've had this for 6 months and it's great. Adults and kids have a blast and rather easy to set up with 2 people.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Pattman

customer_reviews.title: Very well made & easy to install
customer_reviews.text: What a hit with the grandkids & even the adults!! Very well made & easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Fidler

customer_reviews.title: Hit of the neighborhood!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and all of the neighborhood kids love this! Super fast and fun when it lights up!
customer_reviews.author: nashvilleme

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift but sure the grand kids will love it
customer_reviews.author: Happy buyer

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this zip line. We added a brake system because it can really pick up speed. My kids range in ages from 15-7 and all 4 love it! The lights on the seat make it fun for night time.
customer_reviews.author: Kim o'brien

customer_reviews.title: Very Easy Setup
customer_reviews.text: Setup was very easy and everything seems very durable. Kids have had a lot of fun so far!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Lang

customer_reviews.title: We love it. The kids can't wait to get outside ...
customer_reviews.text: We love it. The kids can't wait to get outside now.
customer_reviews.author: Yawanoc

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend this brand due to noise
customer_reviews.text: Very loud metal on metal sound while using zip line. Would not recommend this brand due to noise.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ferreira

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: Great for kids! My daughter plays on it daily! Simple to put up. Need 2 people and something to stretch and hold the line while putting it up
customer_reviews.author: Cassie E. Hall

customer_reviews.title: This was generally easy to install with the help of a friend
customer_reviews.text: This was generally easy to install with the help of a friend. The zipline was a huge hit at our sons birthday party!!!! I'd definitely recommend this for kids to have a blast with!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like the kit. Rubber handles both came off of zip line trolley. Very dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Lassiter

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SYSTEM BUT NEED BUNGE BRAKE
customer_reviews.text: YOU WILL NEED BUNGE BRAKE. THIS WAS ANOTHER PURCHASE IN OUR CASE
customer_reviews.author: Happy to help

customer_reviews.title: This has been great. A big hit with n my kids and ...
customer_reviews.text: This has been great. A big hit with n my kids and the neighborhood.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory M. Kane

customer_reviews.text: Simply awesome. Straight forward set up and the kids LOVE it.
customer_reviews.author: matthew woodhouse

customer_reviews.title: Product came without a light up seat so it has ...
customer_reviews.text: Product came without a light up seat so it has to be returned which is turned it to a nightmare. Seat can not be provided so it has to go back
customer_reviews.author: Olga Perron

customer_reviews.title: They love it!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my niece and nephew. They love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Dalton

customer_reviews.title: Who doesn't love a zipline???
customer_reviews.text: This is a great addition to our back yard and our son and his buddies love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old and her friends love the zip line. They play for hours on it.
customer_reviews.author: Kiwi

customer_reviews.title: Lousy Quality Control....Missing essential parts.
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT ORDER....THE PACKAGE WAS MISSING THE SEAT, THE CORD THAT THE SEAT MOUNTS TO. We went through the process of bringing it up to our vacation home and the grandkids were so excited to use it. The guys put it up only to find that the parts were missing. Believe the other reviewers when they say, parts are missing because they are!
customer_reviews.author: Davylyn

customer_reviews.title: 7 year old daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.text: very cool. easy to set up. lights are a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: diefehler

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment!
customer_reviews.text: Our boys and neighbors love this! It is do much fun.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for our 8 yr old grandson. He and his two brothers are going to love this!!
customer_reviews.author: GrandiS

customer_reviews.title: It was fairly easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: The zip line was what we expected. It was fairly easy to set up. Kids love it. Overall good product.
customer_reviews.author: Tomn

customer_reviews.title: hours of fun!!
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to the back yard! Kids love it and no need for a harness etc. lights up wonderfully at night! Just protect the trees you wrap from the wire!
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Wisdom

customer_reviews.title: zipline with lights
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made product. It was easy to put up and required no trip to the hardware store. The hardest part was finding two trees the right space apart. We mounted a pool mat vertical on the landing tree for safety and it works perfectly. All the kids (old and young) have had a great time with this and probably will for many years to come. They say it's their all time favorite and they haven't begun to tire of it even after a month of riding it.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Jo

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: We waited two months for this product, then ended up with a $200 seat that didn't glow. Nothing else: no cable, no instructions, no trolley, zip. I would strongly suggest buyers find another solution for creating backyard adventures.
customer_reviews.author: MTS

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install great fun zipline.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. The light up seat is really nice to have. We had it up and going w/in an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Sofijb

customer_reviews.title: ... was challenging but my 9 & 3 yr old love it.
customer_reviews.text: Set up was challenging but my 9 & 3 yr old love it.
customer_reviews.author: MomOfThree

customer_reviews.title: My Children Love It!!
customer_reviews.text: Of course I love it too. The directions were well done and it was easy to install. Thinking on buying a second.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Crosby

customer_reviews.title: But everything else was fine and kids really like it
customer_reviews.text: Setup took longer than expected, but once setup correctly with the Proper Break, DO NOT BUY A cheap Break or the tree will stop you. Lights are very cheap and will break and stop working, But everything else was fine and kids really like it.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hollis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We installed this one for the grandkids and they enjoyed it so much!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made very good, and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the light up zip line for out 9 yr. old Grandson, he loves it. Looking forward to summer time, so he can zip over the pool. Made very good, and easy to assemble. Good price
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Was easy to put up by myself
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to put up by myself. Instructions on the how high to install it was a little hard but after one adjustment it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's the greatest! The kids love it and so do the adults.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Sixto

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: TWO times I received this zip line & the seat was not in the box.

customer_reviews.title: happy grandma
customer_reviews.text: my grand kid love this and I would recommend this product they have lots of fun on it
customer_reviews.author: mary sellers

customer_reviews.title: Looks like you are only supposed to use it during months ...
customer_reviews.text: We sent ours back because it says on the inside description that it is not to be used in cold weather. Looks like you are only supposed to use it during months you would use a pool. Bummed!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline May

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts
customer_reviews.text: Had to send it back because the seat was missing!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Goins

customer_reviews.title: They love it and the neighborhood kids do too
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our kids for Christmas..Wow! They love it and the neighborhood kids do too!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie lovelace

customer_reviews.title: We love it! Very sturdy-needed two adults to set it ...
customer_reviews.text: We love it! Very sturdy-needed two adults to set it up but only took about half an hour. Highly recommend this brand!!
customer_reviews.author: Michele L.

customer_reviews.title: Did not come with a pin to connect it to ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with a pin to connect it to the trolly... had to get one from local hardware store.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Heino

customer_reviews.title: Everyone's loves this!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son is a 40yr old engineer who loves to build and create things. I bought this for my Grandsons, 7 & 8. Well my son absolutely loved this. Of course he added his own little touches, now everywhere he takes this, it is the biggest hit with everyone and used all the time!!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: excelent prodct
customer_reviews.text: preformed better than expected ; great family fun. very low maintaince .easy to install. would defiantly recommend for all families.
customer_reviews.author: Roni McFarland

customer_reviews.title: Loads of Fun
customer_reviews.text: My two grandsons, according to their mother, were very excited to get this gift and they were not disappointed. They spend hours playing on it in the back yard and many friends joined them for fun. This turned out to be just as much a draw at the swimming pool.
customer_reviews.author: Bideford

customer_reviews.title: A Good Ride!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and pretty fun! No special tools required. The reviewer who said you'd need a come-along isn't right. It could be beneficial but is def not needed. Do plan to retighten it from time to time as it will stretch under the weight of kids or adults. Also budget for a longer cable in a couple of months for those other trees over there that would make an even more awesome run!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel L.

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: The sets for this is junk. The lights stopped working after a month and I can't return or replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Vernie

customer_reviews.title: The 50 LED seat did not come with it as ...
customer_reviews.text: The 50 LED seat did not come with it as advertised. Unfortunately didn't find this out till kids opened it on Christmas
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great kit and easy to put up
customer_reviews.text: Great kit and easy to put up. Instructions are a little difficult to follow but if you skip around and combine the different sections you can figure it out. Smooth ride and the lights are an added benefit.
customer_reviews.author: Dolfanguy

customer_reviews.title: ok but no brake
customer_reviews.text: It's ok except the clamps came loose that pinch the cable and there is no brake. The light that goes on the trolley is flimsy
customer_reviews.author: Stlblues

customer_reviews.title: Pretty awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Got it and set it up right away on our property. Very cool!! The lights are great for dusk/night riding. Would definately recommend a break and adjusting the decent because you can really pick up a lot of speed and can end up getting hurt. Everyone really likes it from kids to adults. A really cool way to get kids out and active!! (big kids too)
customer_reviews.author: William Heitmann

product_meta.title: 100' Night Riderz Series Zipline Kit
product_meta.description: Most agree that zipline kits are one of the most exciting items that you can put in your backyard for hours of enjoyment. The Night Riderz zipline kit extends your zipline fun into the night with 50 LED lights on the seat, rope and trolley. Brand 44 ziplines help improve strength and balance all while riding a just a few feet off the ground. Turn your backyard into an extreme adventure park with Brand 44 Ziplines. Includes: 100' galvanized steel cable, 50 LED lighted saucer seat with adjustable 10' rope, fully assembled steel trolley with comfortable rubber grip handles, hardware to attach to 2 trees, instructions.
feature_bullets: High Quality. 4 Blinking Rope Lights. Ages 8+, 200 pounds maximum
Extend hours of daytime playtime into the night with the popular light zipline kit contained 50 multicolored LED lights on the seat, rope and trolley
100' cable gives a long ride with a gradual stop at the end allowing for the best backyard zipline ride with no brakes needed
Fully assembled trolley and very thorough instructions decrease the setup time so you will be ziplining in 30 minutes
